mapper.insert: insert into t_favorite_shop (fsid, uid, sid, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) values (#{fsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_favorite_shop set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user = #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fsid = #{fsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fsid, uid, sid, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time from t_favorite_shop
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_favorite_shop WHERE uid = #{uid} AND sid = #{sid}
